FuncDef: This command enables a proactive refresh of the neighbor entries. When enabled, at the stale timer expiration, the router sends an NUD message to the host (regardless of the existence of traffic to the IP address on the IOM), so the entry can be refreshed or removed.

ParaDef.Info: Refreshes global neighbor entries. This parameter is relevant only to global IPv6 addresses.
Refreshes link local neighbor entries. This parameter is relevant only to global IPv6 addresses.
Refreshes both global and link local neighbor entries. This parameter is relevant only to global IPv6 addresses.
